attributes.action: Include Nigel farage on Comitee to to negotiate Brexit
attributes.additional_details: As a MEP of many years standing he has a great knowledge of how the EU works and we would be unwise not to avail ourselves of his expertise
attributes.background: It was Nigel farage Ceasless campaigning for a referendum on EU membership that got us a Vote on Brexit. It is only fair that he should have a part in the negotiations
